statements: SELECT * FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_id ASC;
SELECT property_id, notification_message FROM notifications WHERE policy_change_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT notification_id, notification_message FROM notifications WHERE property_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM notifications ORDER BY policy_change_date DESC;
SELECT notification_id, property_id, policy_change_date FROM notifications WHERE notification_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT notification_id, notification_message FROM notifications WHERE policy_change_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE notification_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY notification_id DESC;
SELECT notification_message FROM notifications WHERE property_id = 3 AND NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE ILIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT DISTINCT property_id, COUNT(*) AS num_notifications FROM notifications GROUP BY property_id HAVING num_notifications > 1 ORDER BY num_notifications DESC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyTerms WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_id, policy_date FROM PolicyTerms WHERE property_id = 5;
SELECT owner_name, email_address FROM PropertyOwners WHERE owner_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM PolicyTerms ORDER BY policy_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, notification_content FROM PolicyTerms WHERE notification_content LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT * FROM PolicyTerms WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, email_address FROM PropertyOwners WHERE owner_id = 2;
SELECT policy_id, notification_content FROM PolicyTerms WHERE policy_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PropertyOwners WHERE property_id IN (SELECT property_id FROM PolicyTerms WHERE policy_date < '2021-12-31');
SELECT owner_name, email_address FROM PropertyOwners JOIN PolicyTerms ON PropertyOwners.property_id = PolicyTerms.property_id;
SELECT * FROM policy_changes WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT id, change_date, change_description FROM policy_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT owner_name, email_address FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE notification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT message FROM notifications WHERE owner_id = 2 ORDER BY notification_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_changes WHERE policy_id = 1 ORDER BY change_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT owner_name, email_address FROM property_owners WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT notification_id, message, notification_date FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT pc.id, po.owner_name, pc.change_description, n.message FROM policy_changes pc JOIN property_owners po ON pc.policy_id = po.property_id JOIN notifications n ON po.owner_id = n.owner_id;
SELECT policy_id, MAX(change_date) AS last_change_date FROM policy_changes GROUP BY policy_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM property_owners;
SELECT owner_name, email FROM property_owners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT notification_text, notification_date FROM notification_logs WHERE notification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, property_id, email FROM property_owners WHERE property_id = 1001;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name FROM property_owners WHERE owner_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, property_id FROM property_owners WHERE property_id > 100;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, email, property_id FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM policy_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM notification_logs WHERE notification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM property_owners;
SELECT owner_name, email FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT notification_type_name, notification_template FROM notification_types WHERE notification_type_id = 2;
SELECT policy_name FROM policies WHERE policy_id = 5;
SELECT owner_name, email FROM property_owners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM property_owners;
SELECT owner_name, email FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policies ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT owner_name, notification_type_name FROM property_owners JOIN notification_recipients ON property_owners.owner_id = notification_recipients.owner_id;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE sent_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sent_date ASC;
